original_title: Admiral Colombage new Ambassador to ASEAN
original_body_lines: Newly-appointed Ambassador of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka to ASEAN Admiral (Prof) Jayanath Colombage  presented his Letter of Credence to the Secretary-General of ASEAN Dr Kao Kim Hourn at the ASEAN Secretariat.
They discussed ways and means to further enhance ASEAN-Sri Lanka relations to bring about more benefit for their peoples.
Japanese Foreign Minister in Sri Lanka on Friday; Scheduled to meet President, PM
